title: can u get unban if u wer banned from before instant feedback system
body:
i get permabanned ages ago i wonder if i can be unban now because robot does the banning now but before i think the humans do it
#reformed

replies.body: Humans were more accurate, the bot is terrible in general.

yes. yes it is.
